semsim.utilities

Class ResourcesManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • semsim.utilities.ResourcesManager

  • public class ResourcesManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class for reading files either outside or inside the SemSim package and organizing the info in lookup tables, reference sets, etc.
    Author:
    mneal

      • createHashMapFromFile

        public static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> createHashMapFromFile(java.lang.String path,
                                                                                           boolean usecommaseparator)
                                                                                    throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Read contents of a file into a HashMap. Semi-colon indicates separator between key String and the key's values.
        Parameters:
        path - Path to file
        usecommaseparator - Whether to use the comma character as the separator between entries in the String[] part of the mapping
        Returns:
        HashMap that relates a String key with an array of String values
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException

      • createHashMapFromResource

                                                                                               boolean usecommaseparator)
                                                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        For loading HashMaps from resources internally stored in SemSim packages
        Parameters:
        internalpath - Internal path to file
        usecommaseparator - Whether to use the comma character to create separate the elements of the String[] object in a mapping.
        Returns:
        A HashMap that relates a String index to a String array.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
